subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After beating Duke, third-seeded Clemson will play for the A.C.C. title for the first time since 1962 and for only the second time in 55 years of conference tournament play.
snippet: After beating Duke, third-seeded Clemson will play for the A.C.C. title for the first time since 1962 and for only the second time in 55 years of conference tournament play.
